name.richardson.james.bukkit.utilities.plugin
Interface Debuggable

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimplePlugin
public interface Debuggable

The Debuggable interface represents a class which can output debugging information and provide additional information to the server log when required.

Method Summary

          Checks if this class is currently debugging.
